summary: The nation's transit agencies are having a hard time finding the qualified workers and managers needed to keep buses, trains, and ferries moving. We examined the outlook for the transit workforce. We found: Current federal projections of future workforce needs either don’t include or aren’t specific to the transit workforce The Federal Transit Administration's strategic planning could be more effective in assisting transit agencies with...
title: Transit Workforce Development: Improved Strategic Planning Practices Could Enhance FTA Efforts
